title: REANA analysis specification
description: Full analysis specification including data, sofware, environment and workflow enabling reproducibility on a REANA cluster.

code.title: Analysis code.
code.description: All source code files used by the analysis.

files.title: Source code files list.
files.description: List of source code files used by the analyses.

environments.title: Set of analysis' environments.
environments.description: All container images needed to reproduce the analysis.

items.title: Analysis environments.
items.description: Analysis environments represented by container technology and image name.

image.title: Environment image id.
image.description: String which represents an image used as environment for one or more steps of an analysis.

type.title: Container technology.
type.description: Name which represents a supported container technology to provide as a REANA environment.

author.title: Analysis author.
author.description: User or group who created the analysis.

files.title: Analysis results.
files.description: Expected output from analysis represented by a set of files.

files.title: Analysis input files.
files.description: List of files provided as input for a given analysis.

parameters.title: Analysis parameters.
parameters.description: Key value data structure which represents the analysis parameters.

workflows.title: Analysis workflows.
workflows.description: Set of workflow which represent the steps that need to be run to reproduce an analysis.

items.title: Analysis workflow.
items.description: Workflow which represent the steps that need to be run to reproduce an analysis.

type.title: Workflow engine.
type.description: Name which represents a supported workflow engine to be used to reproduce the analysis.
